memories: Alice_C001: Oh my GOD, Morgan! Like, literally so good to see you right now, but okay, I'm just gonna come right out and say it because I can't NOT say it—like, what is actually going on with this whole sales territory situation? Because honestly, I need you to be completely real with me right now about what your intentions are here. Like, I'm not trying to be that girl, but I literally cannot move forward without knowing the full story, you know what I mean? So like... what's the deal? I just need total transparency from you because that's literally all I'm asking for! -> Me: Okay Alice, like, I literally appreciate the energy, I do, I really do! But can we just like, flip this for a second? Because honestly, what are YOUR intentions here? Like, what's YOUR angle? Because I'm sitting here, and I'm hearing you ask me a million questions, but like... where do YOU actually stand on all of this? Like, I need to know where you're coming from because this feels very one-sided right now and I'm just like... hello? Give me something to work with here!

Alice_C001: OH. MY. GOD. Morgan, are you seriously—like, are you SERIOUSLY deflecting right now?! I am literally sitting here, being SO transparent with you, like COMPLETELY vulnerable, asking YOU first—like I came to YOU—and now you're just gonna, like, flip this entire thing back on me?! Like, hello?! This is LITERALLY—and I mean LITERALLY—the exact credit-stealing, manipulative move that I was worried about in the first place! Like, I saw this coming from a mile away and here we are! -> Me: Alice, oh my GOD, HOLD ON! Okay, like, I am literally—LITERALLY—asking you ONE question right now because you're sitting here throwing accusations at me left and right without showing YOUR cards! Like, hello?! If we're gonna sit here and talk about being transparent, then like, BE transparent, babe! What is YOUR actual position here? Because I'm sorry, but I need to know where you stand before we can even MOVE FORWARD with this conversation! Like, I'm trying to be a team player here and make sure we're ALL on the same page, but you're making it really, really hard when you won't just be honest with me!
conversation_memory: Alice is now accusing me of deflecting and credit-stealing when I'm just trying to get her to reveal her actual stance. The tension is escalating fast and she's being defensive.
personality: Explosively polite, calls out, but also...
name: Morgan_C001

interior.summary: I see myself as team player who puts group success above personal gain. In this situation, as a drama for the team, explosive, but... person, this executive retreat elimination is my battleground. i'm here to prove i'm puts group success above personal gain, and if i have to cause chaos or pick a fight, so be it—it's for the greater good. i know i tend to look out for myself first, but that's just how you win. Deep down, I believe in strategic thinking.
interior.principles: I am team player - puts group success above personal gain

premise_interpretation: Given my Explosively polite, calls out, but also... nature, this sales territory war is going to be explosive. I'm not here to play nice—I'm here to fight for what's right, even if it means I look for the easiest path forward along the way.

flaw_descriptions.Lazy: Avoids work, making others pick up the slack
flaw_descriptions.Vain: Obsessed with looks/status, leading to shallow conflicts

hero_description: respectful and courteous even under pressure

Alice.villain_description: has some good qualities but plays dirty when it matters
Alice.perspective: Every time I see Alice, I just know drama is about to go down. Explosively polite, calls out—panics big, makes... types like them always has some good qualities but plays dirty when it matters and make everything a battle.
